SubtleCryptoGenerateKey.summary:
Use the generateKey() method of the
interface to generate a new key (for symmetric algorithms)
or key pair (for public-key algorithms).

remarks.para:
-Cryptographic key length recommendations.
-NIST Transitioning the Use of Cryptographic Algorithms and Key Lengths.

SubtleCryptoGenerateKey.returns:
A that fulfills with a
(for symmetric algorithms) or a
(for public-key algorithms).
